name: Color Defense (itch) (Aztec Game Studio)
description:
In this particular take on the tower defense genre,  you have to launch color bombs to convert monsters into different colors, until you create white!

This is a prototype. If you think a larger game could come of this, tell us so please!

Made for the Weekly Game Gam 

208 "Rainbow"

Audio from freesound.com

  • n_audioman "vaporize"
  • abacagi   "explosion_sfx"

All visuals and programming by me
